class_notes: This class is for MN semester 1 students only.
course_description: This course provides students with fundamental principles of nursing and clinical practice including an introduction to critical thinking, bioethics, nursing process, evidence-based practice, communication, health promotion/disease prevention, informatics and patient- and family centered care.
sections: Class Nbr: 3103, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11a-12:15p, Instructor: L. Modly, Status: Open
